name: HamStuck
description:
HamStuck is a casual game designed for mobile (even tough you can play also in the browser), where you can peek inside a day in super-interesting the life of a hamster. The goal of the game is to keep the wheel going for as long as possible, in order to reach the highest score possible (highscores can be shared online, so make sure to challenge your friends).

How to Play

  • Draw circles around the wheel to make it move (either with the cursor PC or with your finger on mobile).
  • The faster you draw them, the faster the wheel will go.
  • Beware of speed: once you accelerate, there's no turning back.

This game was developed in around 36 hours as a submission for the Ludum Dare 47.

Authors:

  • Tommaso (programming, game design)
  • Beatrice (game design, art, UI)
  • Francesca (art)
